root: ^Thank you for meeting with us again.
^Thank you for allowing me into your house once more.
^It is our pleasure to host you.
^No, I mean, how are you really doing?
^Do not be afraid to share with sincerity.

BEHONEST: ^I am afraid that I am not trusted anymore.
^This magic crisis has taken a toll, not physically, but emotionally.
^I am only beginning to recognize how much danger is posed to the world presently.
^I want to protect everyone, but perhaps I have grown too eager to seek justice that I am acting irrationally in order to obtain it.
^Ariar has told me that we need to take immediate, and possibly significant action in order to save everyone.
^I want to help save the world, but I am worried I will have to sacrifice my own moral desires to do so.
^By nature of being in such a bizarre situation, I feel alone in the face of extreme danger.
^That is a lot to deal with.
^We are sorry that you have this much to endure.
^It is the responsibility of the house leaders to aid in providing safety to the world.
^Know that you are not alone in your mission.
^And even if it were, it would to the detriment of the world.
^You hold so much responsibility to protect others.
SAYYOUREFINE: ^Indeed, with all the dangers the world is facing,
^it is good that you have been able to stay resiliant.
^It would do no good if I allowed the world to crumble by my own stress.
^But do not neglect to take care of yourself.
